translated: A flying fox fruit bat Ruykyu of Ryukyu at night in a tree, on the island of Komaha Name (s) joint (s) of Ryukyu flying fox, flying fox Scientific name Formosa dasymallus Pteropus bats Classification of the flying foxes distribution Japan Taiwan], Philippines living environment for.
